description.plain:
Stanley Omah Didia, best known as Omah Lay (b. 19 May 1997), is a Nigerian singer-songwriter based in Ikwerre, Rivers State.

He first burst onto the scene in 2020, as his self-produced track “Bad Influence” became a viral hit all across social media; he later released the song “You” as his official debut single.

After receiving several accolades and releasing his first two EPs, Omah Lay gained even more recognition for his collaborations with Justin Bieber, especially their 2022 joint single, “Attention”. The song served as a promotional single for Omah’s debut studio album, Boy Alone, which was released on July 15, 2022.

body.plain:
Stanley Omah Didia, best known as Omah Lay (b. 19 May 1997), is a Nigerian singer-songwriter based in Ikwerre, Rivers State.

He first burst onto the scene in 2020, as his self-produced track “Bad Influence” became a viral hit all across social media; he later released the song “You” as his official debut single.

After receiving several accolades and releasing his first two EPs, Omah Lay gained even more recognition for his collaborations with Justin Bieber, especially their 2022 joint single, “Attention”. The song served as a promotional single for Omah’s debut studio album, Boy Alone, which was released on July 15, 2022.

songs.title: Godly

description.plain: In this song, Omah Lay sings about the aftermath of his fame and success, he is thankful for God being there and that he hasn’t lost his way

songs.title: Lo Lo

description.plain:
Fresh artist Omah Lay whose mission is to disturb the industry with hits jams has served up another new song titled Lo Lo.

Omah Lay’s latest track ‘Lo Lo’ is lifted from his latest solo project titled “Get Layd” EP.

https://xclusiveloaded.com/omah-lay-lo-lo/
